snippet.title: Twinsen's Little Big Adventure 2 Classic Trailer
snippet.description:
A new adventure awaits

The world of Twinsun is in peace after the young Quetch Twinsen defeated the evil Dr. FunFrock. New trouble arises when aliens land on the planet and strange things start to happen. Who are these Esmers? Are they friend or foe? Twinsen needs to grab his Magic Ball and investigate. With help from his friends and fiancée Zoé, he needs to level up his magic, fly into space and uncover ancient mysteries to save his planet once again.


* Experience a light toned, yet deep and compelling hero story
* Solve mysteries and puzzles to unravel a secret plot to destroy your planet
* Meet fun and quirky characters and collaborate with friends
* Discover a colorful world full of diverse islands and exotic locations, some even off-world!
* Sneak, run, jump and fight your way through danger (disclaimer: this game contains cartoon violence)
* Dream away to the amazing soundtrack
